title: Is there ever going to be, a rapper, better than Eminem? - Quora

response.answer_text: Biggie Tupac J Cole Kendrick Lamar Tyler, the Creator Drake MF Doom Kanye Jay Z Ice Cube Nas Eazy E Dr. Dre Snoop Dogg Travis Scott Ski Mask the Slump God Schoolboy Q Noname Meek Mill LL Cool J Lil Wayne Lauryn Hill Kid Cudi Chance the Rapper Childish Gambino Earl Sweatshirt Vince Staples Etc. Take their ENTIRE discography into consideration. All of these rappers have been more consistent, diverse, and yet constantly improve and change for the better. Revival, Relapse, Kamikaze, Recovery have all been garbage albums that can only be described as annoying.
